INTERACTION.COMMENT: More frequent testing of the INR. Adjustment of the dosage of the vitamin K antagonist during the treatment with the danazol and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of carbamazepine with signs of overdose
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible reduction of the dosage of the carbamazepine.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin due to inhibition of its hepatic metabolism
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of ciclosporin, testing of the renal function, and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Diabetes inducing effect of the danazol
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these substances together cannot be avoided, inform the patient and reinforce self-monitoring of blood glucose. Possibly adjust the dosage of the insulin during the treatment with the danazol and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these medications together is deemed necessary, do not exceed the dose of 10mg of simvastatin.
